29c190ea5d86.title: We need this solution or something like it.

paragraphs.text: We need this solution or something like it. Maybe a judge being apolitical is just a “sheen” or “illusion”, but it’s a crucial one. In my state judges cannot belong to discriminatory organizations (except religious ones); being barred from joining an anti-LGBT club doesn’t “make” a judge less anti-gay (the real problem is that he WANTS to join), but…
paragraphs.name: 03fc

2f52911431fe.title: Simple solution — restore the Constitutional limits of Article I, II and III without expansions…

paragraphs.text: Simple solution — restore the Constitutional limits of Article I, II and III without expansions using clauses, new word meaning, modernization, or the living open concept of the usurping Congress, Executive and the Courts. Clearly if the Supreme court was bound by the Constitution the votes would be 0–9 or 9–0. Any change in the vote count shows the Political bent is of the first order.
paragraphs.name: c9fe
